languages.text: "Ты слишком добр{mf||а} ко мне, {name}. Тебе стоило назвать другое имя — я не заслуживаю тебя и уж точно не стану снова претендовать на твое доверие".
"You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."
languages.original_text: "Ты слишком добр{mf||а} ко мне, {name}. Тебе стоило назвать другое имя — я не заслуживаю тебя и уж точно не стану снова претендовать на твое доверие".

traits.locale_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."
"You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."
"You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."
"You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."
"You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu gütig, {name}. Aber Ihr hättet eine andere Wahl treffen sollen ... Ich verdiene Euch nicht und werde keinen Anspruch mehr auf Euer Vertrauen erheben."
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu gütig, {name}. Aber Ihr hättet eine andere Wahl treffen sollen ... Ich verdiene Euch nicht und werde keinen Anspruch mehr auf Euer Vertrauen erheben."

languages.text: « Votre sollicitude me touche, {name}, mais vous auriez dû choisir quelqu'un d'autre. Je ne vous mérite pas et je n'aspirerai plus jamais à devenir votre confident. »
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: « Votre sollicitude me touche, {name}, mais vous auriez dû choisir quelqu'un d'autre. Je ne vous mérite pas et je n'aspirerai plus jamais à devenir votre confident. »

languages.text: 「あなたは私に優しすぎます。あなたは他の人の名前を挙げるべきでした。私はあなたにふさわしくない。あなたの信頼を再び得ようなどとはきっと思わないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私に優しすぎます。あなたは他の人の名前を挙げるべきでした。私はあなたにふさわしくない。あなたの信頼を再び得ようなどとはきっと思わないでしょう」

languages.text: «Es demasiado amable conmigo, {name}. Debería haber elegido a otra persona... Yo no le merezco, y desde luego que nunca me atreveré a pretender que confíe en mí otra vez».
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: «Es demasiado amable conmigo, {name}. Debería haber elegido a otra persona... Yo no le merezco, y desde luego que nunca me atreveré a pretender que confíe en mí otra vez».

languages.text: “你对我太仁慈了，{name}。你应该选其他人，我配不上你，也不敢渴望能再次得到你的信任。”
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: “你对我太仁慈了，{name}。你应该选其他人，我配不上你，也不敢渴望能再次得到你的信任。”

languages.text: "Bana karşı çok naziksin {name}. Bir başkasını seçmeliydin. Seni hak etmiyorum ve bir daha güvenini kazanmayı arzulamayacağıma emin olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, {name}. You should have named another — I don't deserve you and I certainly won't aspire to be in your confidence ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Bana karşı çok naziksin {name}. Bir başkasını seçmeliydin. Seni hak etmiyorum ve bir daha güvenini kazanmayı arzulamayacağıma emin olabilirsin."
